attributes.action: Compulsory discrete financial lessons for schools in the UK.
attributes.additional_details: Many students lack financial knowledge and many schools and teachers lack the skills to teach the students. Teaching students financial skills will help them to save, earn and know what to do with their money throughout their life.
attributes.background: Create financial lessons that students can attend once a week to enhance their financial skills e.g. learning about credit score and how to effectively save money.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/631393
